## Tomato Regression

$$
\log(y) = \beta_0 + \beta_1 x + \varepsilon
\\
\varepsilon \sim N(0,\sigma^2)
\\
E(\log(y)) = \beta_0 + \beta_1x,
$$

where $y$ is tomato price and $x$ is time (month). 

```{r tomato, echo=TRUE}
tom_reg <- lm(log(value) ~ date, data = tom_and_egg %>% 
                filter(name == "tomato_price"))
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
summary(tom_reg) %>%
  broom::tidy() %>%
  knitr::kable()

summary(egg_reg) %>% 
  broom::glance() %>%
  knitr::kable()
```
